# Introduction

The below are metrics based on various data quality tests done.

## Test failures by GLH

The below table shows the number of test failures by GLH and test

```{r, test fails per GLH, echo = FALSE}

kable(table(tr$test_id[!tr$test_result], tr$glh[!tr$test_result]))

```
